website_summaries.verdict: This mask can unblock follicles leading to healthy hair re-growth.
pros: Treat your scalp to a deep cleanse that targets follicle blockage and can lead to fuller, cleaner hair with regular use
Customers report positive results within weeks
Some reports of new hair growth as well
cons: Review ingredients in advance to be sure the chemical ingredients align with your needs

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this product! My hair is fine, thin, and wavy and this conditioner keeps my scalp exfoliated. It also makes my hair very soft and gives it body. I will definitely be purchasing again. Also, I have used it as a co-conditioner, before shampooing, and after shampooing and have been very happy with it for all uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Exhilarating!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am not sure if it actually is helping with the growth of new hair, but it makes your scalp feel great and your hair comes out really soft.
customer_reviews.author: RevDesigns

customer_reviews.title: Love The Way It Feels on My Hair
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this product when I ordered the shampoo and conditioner. I used it when I used the other products, and I loved it right away. I love the way it felt on my scalp. So I ordered the regular size the same day. The micro beads massaged my scalp as I was applying the treatment and then there was a slight tingling sensation but in a good way. The only reason I gave it three stars is because I have only used it twice so far. I will come back on after I have used it for 6-8 weeks to see if I can up the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.. Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Scrubs away product build up, and then revitalizes scalp, hair follicles & hair shafts!s!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It's like a conditioning hair masque for your actual hair, plus an exfoliating scalp treatment; all in one! The exfoliating "little grits" are coarse enough to scrub away build-up but are not scratchy or too rough. My hair is very fine, platinum blonde (sometimes toned to a silvery-mossy, cool toned blonde,) and it does not weigh-down my hair- at all! My hair feels so soft, moisturized and has volume all at the same time... that never happens when I use a hair masque! Highly recommended! Love Love Love

customer_reviews.title: reduces frizzies, helps with detangling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I use it about once a week or longer if you feel you don't need it. It conditions the hair so that it easier to manage. It makes your hair very soft and easier to comb out tangles. I use it once every couple of weeks. You can use before or during your shower. It tells you if: before your shower you need to wet hair apply product and cover with a shower cap for 10 minutes then you can wash it. If it's during your shower you would put this one after washing your hair try to leave on for three minutes. Your hair feels so good after your shower.
